protein.specific_function: Plays a role in limb and brain development. Implicated in the transduction of SHH signal

reference.reference_text: Ruppert JM, Vogelstein B, Arheden K, Kinzler KW: GLI3 encodes a 190-kilodalton protein with multiple regions of GLI similarity. Mol Cell Biol. 1990 Oct;10(10):5408-15.
